tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "You will not use (or assist others in using) our Services in ways that: (a) violate, misappropriate, or infringe the rights of WhatsApp, our users, or others, including privacy, publicity, intellectual property, or other proprietary rights. (b) are illegal,obscene,defamatory,threatening, intimidating, harassing,"
tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
